email_subject: Great deals on the Summer's hottest MP3 players (CNET SHOPPER)
email_body: The body of the email is in HTML format and contains promotional content for various MP3 players such as the iRiver SlimX iMP-350, Sonicblue Rio Riot, TDK Mojo CD-MP3, Sonicblue Rio 600 (32MB), Apple iPod, Sonicblue Rio One (32 MB), and Imation RipGo. It includes images, descriptions, and special offer prices for these products. The email also contains links to unsubscribe or manage subscriptions, as well as links to FAQs and advertising information.
